Package com.auction_system.auction_house

Class RealAuctionHouse

java.lang.Object
com.auction_system.auction_house.RealAuctionHouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdminAH, IBrokerAH, IClientAH, IEntityAH
class RealAuctionHouse
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAdminAH, IBrokerAH, IClientAH
This class models an Auction House.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  RealAuctionHouse.Helper
    Bill Pugh's Singleton implementation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService auctionExecutor
    This ExecutorService holds each auction thread which will be created.
    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Broker> brokerMap
    This Map holds the brokers who are connected to the application.
    It is instantiated using the ConcurrentHashMap implementation for thread safety.
    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Client> clientMap
    This Map holds the clients who are connected to the application.
    It is instantiated using the ConcurrentHashMap implementation for thread safety.
    private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Product> productMap
    This Map holds the products that are going to be sold by the AuctionHouse.
    It is instantiated using the ConcurrentHashMap implementation for thread safety.

    • getProducts

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProducts()
      Returns a list of all products (as Strings) present at the AuctionHouse. Only the administrator can use this method through its proxy.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      a list of all products (as Strings)

    • getProductsClient

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProductsClient()
      Returns a list of the products (as Strings), which have not been sold (no sale price), present at the AuctionHouse. Only a client can use this method through its proxy.
      Returns:
      a list of products (as Strings)
      See Also:
      List, String, Client, ClientAHProxy

    • getProductsBroker

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProductsBroker()

      a list of products (as Strings)

      public void offerInit​(java.lang.String username, int productId, double maxPrice, int rate) throws MyException
